list.abs: 他被认为是当今最杰出的社会理论家(social theorist)之一，到目前为止已经出版了32本书，被翻译成29国文字。很难说我喜欢这个人…

in his book China's New Confucianism , Montreal-born political theorist Daniel A. Bell quips that the CCP might one day be renamed the Chinese Confucian Party .蒙特里尔出生的政治理论家贝淡宁在他的书《中国新儒家》中开玩笑地说中国共产党或许有一天被改名为中国儒家党。

Liu Xizai was a famous scholar , literary theorist and calligrapher in late Qing . he did not like to be an official , to communicate with and to travel all his life .刘熙载是我国晚清时期著名的学者、文艺理论家和书法家，平生不喜为宦、不喜交游，惟以著书教学为己任。
逻辑理论家(Logic Theorist):简称LT,1956年Newell, Shaw和Simon编写的历史上第一个模拟人解决问题的计算机程序。它不仅是世界上第一个成功的人工智能系统,而且是.

entry.def: A theorist is someone who develops an abstract idea or set of ideas about a particular subject in order to explain it.

example.tran: 不附和任何教条的理论家

means.word_mean: 1. someone who theorizes (especially in science or art)
